description.narrative: The Kaleidoscope Trust (Kaleidoscope) is the co-founder and coordinator of The Commonwealth Equality Network (TCEN), the first civil society group to sustainably advocate on behalf of LGBT people within the Commonwealth diplomatic community, institutions and civil society.
